1.text: “For, behold, the day comes, it burns as a furnace; and all the proud, and all who work wickedness, will be stubble; and the day that comes will burn them up,” says Yahweh of Armies, “that it shall leave them neither root nor branch.

2.text: But to you who fear my name shall the sun of righteousness arise with healing in its wings. You will go out, and leap like calves of the stall.

3.text: You shall tread down the wicked; for they will be ashes under the soles of your feet in the day that I make,” says Yahweh of Armies.

4.text: “Remember the law of Moses my servant, which I commanded to him in Horeb for all Israel, even statutes and ordinances.

5.text: Behold, I will send you Elijah the prophet before the great and terrible day of Yahweh comes.

6.text: He will turn the hearts of the fathers to the children, and the hearts of the children to their fathers, lest I come and strike the earth with a curse.”
